stimulusHtml: Assume that the  int  variable  val  has been declared and initialized with a value that satisfies the precondition of the method. Which of the following best describes the value, if any, returned by the call  what(val)?

features.html:
Consider the following recursive method.

 

/** Precondition: num >= 0 */
public static int what(int num)
{
   if (num < 10)
   {
      return 1;
   }
   else
   {
      return 1 + what(num / 10);
   }
}

choicesHtml: The number of digits in  val
The sum of the digits in  val
Nothing is returned. A run-time error occurs because of infinite recursion.
